creator: Locategy SL
descriptionHtml:
Samoby is a Mobile Threat Defense app only for employers who have enrolled on the Samoby Enterprise program. Please contact your company’s IT organization before installing this app. Samoby cannot operate on your device without the required license.

Samoby provides mobile device security and protection from mobile threats for smartphones and tablets. The corporate security policy defined on the cloud dashboard is applied on real-time on the device.

Some features:

• Monitoring without diverting traffic to external VPN or proxy servers.
• Network threats like Mobile Phishing, unsecured WIFI (black and whitelist), IP blocking, unusual traffic by device or app (upload/download- network/WIFI, port, type), traffic analysis by destination IP/domain, Secure Transport Enforcement, ARP Spoofing, Rogue access point, Captive portal, SSL/TLS downgrade, Cellular Network Attack 3G to 2G downgrade, waypoint rules, domain blocking (specific or by categories), etc.
• Device threats like Root, USB debugging, Dev options, Device encryption , Device Pin, vulnerable OS version, SELinux disabled, System Tampering
• Apps threats like Malware detection (“spyware”, “sideloading malware”, etc.), app vetting depending on permissions (containerization / UI), apps from Unknown source, Blacklisted apps, etc.
• Mobile Data Policy: Enforce automatic and real-time corporate data usage rules when employees are travelling abroad.
• Remote wipe and track location in case of loss or theft (Warning: A continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.)


Please contact us at www.samoby.com for a detailed set of features.
descriptionShort: Mobile advanced security. A business license is needed. Please, ask your IT dept

• Network threats like Mobile Phishing, unsecured WIFI (black and whitelist), IP blocking, unusual traffic by device or app (upload/download- network/WIFI, port, type), traffic analysis by destination IP/domain, Secure Transport Enforcement, ARP Spoofing, Rogue access point, Captive portal, SSL/TLS downgrade, Cellular Network Attack 3G to 2G downgrade, waypoint rules, domain blocking (specific or by categories), etc.
• Device threats like Root, USB debugging, Dev options, Device encryption , Device Pin, vulnerable OS version, SELinux disabled, System Tampering
• Apps threats like Malware detection (“spyware”, “sideloading malware”, etc.), app vetting depending on permissions (containerization / UI), apps from Unknown source, Blacklisted apps, etc.
• Mobile Data Policy: Enforce automatic and real-time corporate data usage rules when employees are travelling abroad.
• Remote wipe and track location in case of loss or theft (Warning: A continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.)


Please contact us at www.samoby.com for a detailed set of features.

This apps uses Accessibility permission. Samoby uses Accessibility API in order to monitor the supervised device web activity and apply network related company policies to block URL automatically, even when the app is closed or not in use.

descriptionShort: Mobile advanced security. A business license is needed. Please, ask your IT dept
title: Samoby Security

creator: Locategy SL
descriptionHtml:
Samoby is a corporate digital experience monitoring tool for employers who have enrolled on the Samoby Enterprise program. Please contact your company’s IT organization before installing this app. Samoby cannot operate on your device without the required license.

Samoby provides mobile device experience management for smartphones and tablets. Companies can give proactive support to their employees, and define actions that are applied in real-time on the device for experience enhancement and device protection.

Some features:

• Monitor device hardware and network connectivity health.
• IT Service desk will automatically detect if your device or internet connection is experiencing any problem
• Receive useful corporate information based on the app you use or the facility you are in
• Know better how you use device and network resources, receive alerts if you are draining the data plan.
• Get it touch with support: receive outage notifications, give them feed back, or ask for help.
• Monitoring without diverting traffic to external VPN or proxy servers.
• Network threats like Mobile Phishing, unsecured WIFI (black and whitelist), IP blocking, unusual traffic by device or app (upload/download- network/WIFI, port, type), traffic analysis by destination IP/domain, Secure Transport Enforcement, ARP Spoofing, Rogue access point, Captive portal, SSL/TLS downgrade, Cellular Network Attack 3G to 2G downgrade, waypoint rules, domain blocking (specific or by categories), etc.
• Device threats like Root, USB debugging, Dev options, Device encryption , Device Pin, vulnerable OS version, SELinux disabled, System Tampering
• Apps threats like Malware detection (“spyware”, “sideloading malware”, etc.), app vetting depending on permissions (containerization / UI), apps from Unknown source, Blacklisted apps, etc.
• Mobile Data Policy: Enforce automatic and real-time corporate data usage rules when employees are travelling abroad.
• Remote wipe and track location in case of loss or theft (Warning: A continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.)


Please contact us at www.samoby.com for a detailed set of features.

This apps uses Accessibility permission. Samoby uses Accessibility API in order to monitor the supervised device web activity and apply network related company policies to block URL automatically, even when the app is closed or not in use.

descriptionHtml:
Samoby is a corporate digital experience monitoring tool for employers who have enrolled on the Samoby Enterprise program. Please contact your company’s IT organization before installing this app. Samoby cannot operate on your device without the required license.

Samoby provides mobile device experience management for smartphones and tablets. Companies can give proactive support to their employees, and define actions that are applied in real-time on the device for experience enhancement and device protection.

Some features:

• Monitor device hardware and network connectivity health.
• IT Service desk will automatically detect if your device or internet connection is experiencing any problem
• Receive useful corporate information based on the app you use or the facility you are in
• Know better how you use device and network resources, receive alerts if you are draining the data plan.
• Get it touch with support: receive outage notifications, give them feed back, or ask for help.
• Monitoring without diverting traffic to external VPN or proxy servers.
• Network threats like Mobile Phishing, unsecured WIFI (black and whitelist), IP blocking, unusual traffic by device or app (upload/download- network/WIFI, port, type), traffic analysis by destination IP/domain, Secure Transport Enforcement, ARP Spoofing, Rogue access point, Captive portal, SSL/TLS downgrade, Cellular Network Attack 3G to 2G downgrade, waypoint rules, domain blocking (specific or by categories), etc.
• Device threats like Root, USB debugging, Dev options, Device encryption , Device Pin, vulnerable OS version, SELinux disabled, System Tampering
• Apps threats like Malware detection (“spyware”, “sideloading malware”, etc.), app vetting depending on permissions (containerization / UI), apps from Unknown source, Blacklisted apps, etc.
• Mobile Data Policy: Enforce automatic and real-time corporate data usage rules when employees are travelling abroad.
• Remote wipe and track location in case of loss or theft (Warning: A continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.)


Please contact us at www.samoby.com for a detailed set of features.

This apps uses Accessibility permission. Samoby uses Accessibility API in order to monitor the supervised device web activity and apply network related company policies to block URL automatically, even when the app is closed or not in use.

This app uses VPN Service. Samoby uses VPN Service API in order to monitor the supervised device network activity and apply network related company policies to block malicious IP or unsecured connections, even when the app is closed or not in use.
descriptionShort: Mobile DEM. A business license is needed. Please, ask your IT dept
